replies.msg:
關於Part b
有無人知依句UP咩?
答案一部份黎

We need to verify consistency and sequential rationality of the given assessment. To see consistency note that since both types of player 1 choose B, beliefs at the “Q” information set are unrestricted. To see that Bayes rule determines beliefs at the “B” information set note that 0.9/(0.1+0.9)=0.9

關於Part b
有無人知依句UP咩?
答案一部份黎

We need to verify consistency and sequential rationality of the given assessment. To see consistency note that since both types of player 1 choose B, beliefs at the “Q” information set are unrestricted. To see that Bayes rule determines beliefs at the “B” information set note that 0.9/(0.1+0.9)=0.9


consistency係 PBE 其中一部份definition
"beliefs at Q" unrestricted 因為under equilibrium strategy,
個information set is reached with zero probability
你可以assign any beliefs such that 係Q的 action 係optimal

你講緊既係咪P2?

Both P1 and P2
雖然beliefs係P2的beliefs,
equilibrium下P1都係預期P2有呢種beliefs先會揀equilibrium actions
